select

'true' as QUERYID,
from COUNTERPARTY_BENEFIT_OVER_LIST
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into COUNTERPARTY_BENEFIT_OVER_LIST (ID_NO, CLIENT_ID, NAME, PROPORTION, FIID, PROFESSIONAL_INVESTOR_FLAG, FINANCIAL_ASSETS_OF_LASTYEAR, INVEST_3YEAR_EXP_FLAG, PROD_ID, ASSETS_20MILLION_FLAG) values (#{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proportion,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fiid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{professionalInvestorFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financialAssetsOfLastyear,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invest3yearExpFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assets20millionFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
